channel.title: Compile.bat errors. Whoever finds the solution that works will be hired as mod!
channel.description:
Hello guys. I am making a server, I have done everything, then when i go to use compile.bat it says "The system cannot find the path specified. Press any key to continue..." Does anyone have a solution to this? And I set up the paths,
P.S: If you help me, and the solution works, I will hire you as gold mod on my server when I get it up and running. If I am not online just post and wait, or pm me. ;)

item.title: Compile.bat errors. Whoever finds the solution that works will be hired as mod!
item.dc:creator: @heyhey122 heyhey122
item.source: Compile.bat errors. Whoever finds the solution that works will be hired as mod!

item.title: Compile.bat errors. Whoever finds the solution that works will be hired as mod!
item.dc:creator: @katsuro katsuro
item.description:
@katsuro wrote:

On another topic

Make sure your paths are 1.5.0_07, not _06. The tutorials say to set as 06, but if you get the newest java you need to set as _07. Make sure you do this in path, classpath aswell as compile.bat.

I dont have a _07… I have an _08… o.o

Read full topic
item.source: Compile.bat errors. Whoever finds the solution that works will be hired as mod!

item.title: Compile.bat errors. Whoever finds the solution that works will be hired as mod!
item.dc:creator: @trasulca trasulca
item.description:
@trasulca wrote:

You have to set up a PATH? None of the tuts I have read said PATH, they say CLASSPATH.

Read full topic
